title: Together But Separate

author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
itunes:author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
description: Matthew talks with Abdul (indypolitics.org) about what he has experienced this past week. Plus, grab a pencil, Mathew reads off what a portion of the Facebook and Twitterverse has watched, movie-wise.
